infos.value: ...So you really intend to do it?
Vinera should have already received the order to take Dario's life.
Don't forget about Robb. Hourne remains a threat until both «Solidus» and «Nitor» are obliterated.
We must be sure to keep Machérie alive.
He would gladly sacrifice his life if it meant saving hers.
Could you leave Machérie to me?
She's...humiliated me more times than I care to admit.
Heh heh... Then be sure to make good use of her, piece by piece.
Let's get going. Lingering will only bring unwanted attention.
